# Cargo
[color=#a4885c]Cargo workers[/color] are the ones responsible for [color=#a4885c]supplying[/color] the entire station with whatever it is that they may require, and [color=#a4885c]turning a profit[/color] while doing it. 

 Their jobs are the [color=#a4885c]Cargo Technicians[/color], [color=#a4885c]Salvage Specialists[/color] and their department head, the [color=#a4885c]Quartermaster[/color].

 They handle everything from [color=#a4885c]buying and selling[/color] supplies to [color=#a4885c]mining resources[/color] in space, and [color=#a4885c]take orders[/color] from the crew. 

 Occasionally, they also found [color=#a4885c]The Great Cargonia[/color], an independant nation, and then [color=#a4885c]build their own ship[/color] and fly off into space. 

 (Note : [color=red]ALWAYS seek admins' approval before doing this [/color]!)
